Generated Narrative: CapabilityStatement UNICASConfiguracionServidor

Configuración del Servidor FHIR de ÚNICAS

  • Implementation Guide Version: 0.0.1
  • FHIR Version: 5.0.0
  • Supported Formats: xml, json
  • Supported Patch Formats:
  • Published on: 2025-03-24 11:36:43+0000
  • Published by: null

Note to Implementers: FHIR Capabilities

Any FHIR capability may be 'allowed' by the system unless explicitly marked as 'SHALL NOT'. A few items are marked as MAY in the Implementation Guide to highlight their potential relevance to the use case.

SHALL Support the Following Implementation Guides

  • https://unicas-fhir.sanidad.gob.es/ImplementationGuide/unicas-ig

FHIR RESTful Capabilities

Mode: server

Summary of System-wide Interactions

Capabilities by Resource/Profile

Summary

The summary table lists the resources that are part of this configuration, and for each resource it lists:

  • The relevant profiles (if any)
  • The interactions supported by each resource (Read, Search, Update, and Create, are always shown, while VRead, Patch, Delete, History on Instance, or History on Type are only present if at least one of the resources has support for them.
  • The required, recommended, and some optional search parameters (if any).
  • The linked resources enabled for _include
  • The other resources enabled for _revinclude
  • The operations on the resource (if any)

Resource Conformance: SHALL Patient

Core FHIR Resource
Patient
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

Patient Paciente ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

A patient identifier

SHALLnamestring

A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, given, prefix, suffix, and/or text

SHALLgivenstring

A portion of the given name of the patient

SHALLfamilystring

A portion of the family name of the patient

SHALLgendertoken

Gender of the patient

SHALLbirthdatedate

The patient's date of birth

SHALLdeath-datedate

The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

SHALLdeceasedtoken

This patient has been marked as deceased, or has a death date entered

SHALLaddressstring

A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

SHALLtelecomtoken

The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient

SHALLphonetoken

A value in a phone contact

SHALLemailtoken

A value in an email contact

SHALLorganizationreference

The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

Encounter

Supported Profiles

Encounter Interacción Clínica ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

SHALLclasstoken

Classification of patient encounter

SHALLpatientreference

The patient present at the encounter

SHALLparticipantreference

Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

SHALLparticipant-typetoken

Role of participant in encounter

SHALLpractitionerreference

Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

SHALLservice-providerreference

The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter

SHALLreason-codetoken

Reference to a concept (coded)

SHALLstatustoken

planned | in-progress | on-hold | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | unknown

SHALLdiagnosis-referencereference

The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter (resource reference)

SHALLdiagnosis-codetoken

The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter (coded)

SHALLappointmentreference

The appointment that scheduled this encounter

Reference Policy

DocumentReference Documento en Base64 ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

Identifier of the attachment binary

SHALLtypetoken

Kind of document (LOINC if possible)

SHALLdatedate

When this document reference was created

SHALLpatientreference

Who/what is the subject of the document

SHALLcustodianreference

Organization which maintains the document

SHALLauthorreference

Who and/or what authored the document

SHALLcontenttypetoken

Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

SHALLcontextreference

Context of the document content

SHALLdescriptionstring

Human-readable description

SHALLstatustoken

current | superseded | entered-in-error

SHALLdoc-statustoken

preliminary | final | amended | entered-in-error

Resource Conformance: SHALL AllergyIntolerance

Core FHIR Resource
AllergyIntolerance
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

AllergyIntolerance Alergia ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

External ids for this item

SHALLclinical-statustoken

active | inactive | resolved

SHALLcodetoken

Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance

SHALLcriticalitytoken

low | high | unable-to-assess

SHALLdatedate

Date first version of the resource instance was recorded

SHALLlast-datedate

Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction

SHALLmanifestation-codetoken

Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

SHALLpatientreference

Who the sensitivity is for

SHALLparticipantreference

Who or what participated in the activities related to the allergy or intolerance

SHALLroutetoken

How the subject was exposed to the substance

SHALLseveritytoken

mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

SHALLverification-statustoken

unconfirmed | presumed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

 

Resource Conformance: SHALL Appointment

Core FHIR Resource
Appointment
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

Appointment Cita Agenda ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

An Identifier of the Appointment

SHALLstatustoken

The overall status of the appointment

SHALLservice-categorytoken

A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

SHALLservice-typetoken

The specific service (by coding) that is to be performed during this appointment

SHALLpatientreference

One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

SHALLpractitionerreference

One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

SHALLactorreference

Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

SHALLdatedate

Appointment date/time.

SHALLreason-codetoken

Reference to a concept (by class)

SHALLlocationreference

This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation

Date related onsets (dateTime and Period)

SHALLcategorytoken

The category of the condition

SHALLclinical-statustoken

The clinical status of the condition

SHALLcodetoken

Code for the condition

Who has the condition?

Resource Conformance: SHALL DiagnosticReport

Core FHIR Resource
DiagnosticReport
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

DiagnosticReport Formulario de Enrolamiento ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

An identifier for the report

SHALLcategorytoken

Which diagnostic discipline/department created the report

SHALLcodetoken

The code for the report, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result

SHALLdatedate

The clinically relevant time of the report

SHALLpatientreference

The subject of the report if a patient

SHALLperformerreference

Who is responsible for the report

SHALLstatustoken

The status of the report

SHALLencounterreference

The Encounter when the order was made

SHALLconclusiontoken

A coded conclusion (interpretation/impression) on the report

ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation

MedicationAdministration
Reference Policy

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

Return administrations with this external identifier

Resource Conformance: SHALL MedicationStatement

Core FHIR Resource
MedicationStatement
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

MedicationStatement Prescripción ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

Return statements with this external identifier

SHALLcodetoken

Return statements of this medication code

SHALLmedicationreference

Return statements of this medication reference

SHALLeffectivedate

Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication

SHALLpatientreference

Returns statements for a specific patient.

Who or where the information in the statement came from

Resource Conformance: SHALL Observation

Core FHIR Resource
Observation
Reference Policy
Interaction summary
  • Supports create, search-type, read, vread, update, patch.

Supported Profiles

Observation Dato Antropométrico ÚNICAS
Observation Hábito No Saludable ÚNICAS
Observation Hábito Tóxico ÚNICAS
Observation Obstetrico ÚNICAS

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLidentifiertoken

The unique id for a particular observation

SHALLcategorytoken

The classification of the type of observation

SHALLcodetoken

The code of the observation type

SHALLpatientreference

The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

SHALLperformerreference

Who performed the observation

SHALLdatedate

Clinically relevant time/time-period for observation

SHALLstatustoken

The status of the observation

SHALLcode-value-conceptcomposite

Code and coded value parameter pair

SHALLcode-value-quantitycomposite

Code and quantity value parameter pair

SHALLcode-value-strincomposite

Code and string value parameter pair

SHALLcombo-codetoken

The code of the observation type or component type

SHALLcombo-code-value-conceptcomposite

Code and coded value parameter pair, including in components

SHALLcombo-code-value-quantitycomposite

Code and quantity value parameter pair, including in components

SHALLcombo-value-concepttoken

The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

SHALLcombo-value-quantityquantity

The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

SHALLcomponent-codetoken

The component code of the observation type

SHALLcomponent-code-value-conceptcomposite

Component code and component coded value parameter pair

SHALLcomponent-code-value-quantitycomposite

Component code and component quantity value parameter pair

SHALLcomponent-value-concepttoken

The value of the component observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

SHALLcomponent-value-quantitquantity

The value of the component observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

SHALLvalue-concepttoken

The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

SHALLvalue-datedate

The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

SHALLvalue-quantityquantity

The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

name: UNICASConfiguracionServidor
title: Configuración del Servidor FHIR de ÚNICAS
description: Definición de capability statement del servidor FHIR para red ÚNICAS. Este capability statement se describe en detalle toda la funcionalidad y las capacidades del servidor FHIR implementado para la Red ÚNICAS, que incluye ImplementationGuide, StructureDefinition, ValuSet y CodeSystem.

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A patient identifier

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, given, prefix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the patient

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: The patient's date of birth

searchParam.name: death-date
searchParam.documentation: The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

searchParam.name: deceased
searchParam.documentation: This patient has been marked as deceased, or has a death date entered

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

searchParam.documentation: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter (resource reference)

searchParam.documentation: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter (coded)

searchParam.name: appointment
searchParam.documentation: The appointment that scheduled this encounter

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifier of the attachment binary

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Kind of document (LOINC if possible)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When this document reference was created

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: custodian
searchParam.documentation: Organization which maintains the document

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what authored the document

searchParam.name: contenttype
searchParam.documentation: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Context of the document content

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Human-readable description

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: current | superseded | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: doc-status
searchParam.documentation: preliminary | final | amended | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External ids for this item

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: active | inactive | resolved

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance

searchParam.name: criticality
searchParam.documentation: low | high | unable-to-assess

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Date first version of the resource instance was recorded

searchParam.name: last-date
searchParam.documentation: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction

searchParam.name: manifestation-code
searchParam.documentation: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who the sensitivity is for

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Who or what participated in the activities related to the allergy or intolerance

searchParam.name: route
searchParam.documentation: How the subject was exposed to the substance

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

searchParam.name: verification-status
searchParam.documentation: unconfirmed | presumed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An Identifier of the Appointment

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: service-category
searchParam.documentation: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

searchParam.name: service-type
searchParam.documentation: The specific service (by coding) that is to be performed during this appointment

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Appointment date/time.

searchParam.name: reason-code
searchParam.documentation: Reference to a concept (by class)

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A unique identifier of the condition record

searchParam.name: onset-date
searchParam.documentation: Date related onsets (dateTime and Period)

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The category of the condition

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: The clinical status of the condition

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code for the condition

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: participant-actor
searchParam.documentation: Who or what participated in the activities related to the condition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The Encounter during which this Condition was created

searchParam.name: evidence
searchParam.documentation: Manifestation/symptom

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An identifier for the report

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Which diagnostic discipline/department created the report

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code for the report, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The clinically relevant time of the report

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report if a patient

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who is responsible for the report

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the report

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The Encounter when the order was made

searchParam.name: conclusion
searchParam.documentation: A coded conclusion (interpretation/impression) on the report

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifies this endpoint across multiple systems

searchParam.name: connection-type
searchParam.documentation: Protocol/Profile/Standard to be used with this endpoint connection

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A name that this endpoint can be identified by

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization that is managing the endpoint

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the Endpoint (usually expected to be active)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A search by a record identifier

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A search by a condition code

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list family member history items for

searchParam.name: relationship
searchParam.documentation: A search by a relationship type

searchParam.name: sex
searchParam.documentation: A search by a sex code of a family member

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: partial | completed | entered-in-error | health-unknown

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Business identifier

searchParam.name: vaccine-code
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine Product Administered

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Vaccination (non)-Administration Date

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient for the vaccination record

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner, individual or organization who played a role in the vaccination

searchParam.name: lot-number
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine Lot Number

searchParam.name: reason-code
searchParam.documentation: Reason why the vaccine was administered

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Immunization event status

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An identifier for the location

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A (part of the) address of the location

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the location's name or alias

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: Searches for locations that are managed by the provided organization

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Searches for locations with a specific kind of status

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: A code for the type of location

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications with this external identifier

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for a specific code

searchParam.name: form
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for a specific dose form

searchParam.name: ingredient-code
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for this ingredient code

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for this status

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this external identifier

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication code

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication reference

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list administrations for

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the individual who administered the medication

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations that share this encounter

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return statements with this external identifier

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return statements of this medication code

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return statements of this medication reference

searchParam.name: effective
searchParam.documentation: Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns statements for a specific patient.

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: Who or where the information in the statement came from

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Return statements that match the given status

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Returns statements for a specific encounter

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique id for a particular observation

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who performed the observation

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Clinically relevant time/time-period for observation

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the observation

searchParam.name: code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: code-value-strin
searchParam.documentation: Code and string value parameter pair

searchParam.name: combo-code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type or component type

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: combo-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: combo-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: component-code
searchParam.documentation: The component code of the observation type

searchParam.name: component-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: component-value-quantit
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: value-date
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

searchParam.name: value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A unique identifier for a procedure

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Classification of the procedure

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A code to identify a procedure

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Search by subject - a patient

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who performed the procedure

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When the procedure occurred or is occurring

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: preparation | in-progress | not-done | on-hold | stopped | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The Encounter during which this Procedure was created

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Persistent identifier for the bundle

searchParam.name: timestamp
searchParam.documentation: When the bundle was assembled

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection | subscription-notification
